entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Rain or periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow in the morning and with periods of drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
